column4: hey, can u guys help me, Ive never used Linux, and I just built a 64 bit machine, does anyone know where i can find out if my hardware is compatible
well, My machines not here yet, its shipping from the US, so i was gonna see if i could find any documentation before i downloaded Linux
So does anyone know a good place to find hardware compatability documentation, as well as will this distro work with a 64 bit machine
find a local linux group and get a free live cd
